description: The main source file of a Flutter-based calculator app. Contains the main widget, theming setup, and the stateful calculator screen implementation with display and keypad logic.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: The root widget that sets up theme and routes for the calculator app.

classes.name: CalculatorScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the main calculator interface with display and keypad.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main app widget with theming and routes.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the CalculatorScreen widget.

methods.name: _CalculatorScreenState.build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the calculator screen, including display and keypad.

methods.name: _pressClear
methods.description: Resets the calculator state to initial.

methods.name: _pressDelete
methods.description: Deletes the last character in the current expression.

methods.name: _pressEquals
methods.description: Evaluates the current expression and updates display.

methods.name: _evaluateExpression
methods.description: Parses and evaluates the mathematical expression string.

methods.name: _formatNumber
methods.description: Formats a number for display, removing unnecessary decimals.

methods.name: _sanitizeExpressionForEval
methods.description: Converts display operators to evaluatable symbols.

methods.name: _currentNumberHasDecimal
methods.description: Checks if current number segment contains a decimal point.

methods.name: _isOperator
methods.description: Checks if a string is a calculator operator.

methods.name: _digit
methods.description: Creates a calculator digit button widget.
